name: SEAMLESS_S_FUNC_UNIFORM_MCU3
steps: Step 1.: Check the kernel enables microcode.force_minrev.
Step 2.: Record the dmesg info before late loading process.
Step 3.: Load the proper patch into the intel-ucode folder.
Step 4.: Trigger the late loading process.
Step 5.: Check the updated information for microcode processing.
summary: Verify if microcode could be updated successfully when microcode.force_minrev is enabled.
